column5: I woke this morning to find this on the counter.  Not unusual for Christmas until you realize the youngest person in this house right now is 41 years old.  Pretty sure it was just a joke for ole Dad...hopefully  Merry Christmas everyone !!
Same to you and yours Lew and a very good New Year.
Great way to start the day Lew Merry Christmas
That's great!! Merry Christmas to you and your family Lew!
All our best from our home to yours Lew and Di.    And a nice long ear scratch for Marvin.
Merry Christmas to you, Di and Marv.  Bet he won't mind eating that plate
